typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> FuenteFechaCSV
FuenteFechaCSV alterRow(updateIf(replace({FechaVenta}, '/', '-'))) ~> AlterRowDate
AlterRowDate sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 1) ~> sinkVentasDate
